title: VR-Based Mathematics Instructional Design Studio: Practice Enhancement Through Peer Feedback

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Conducting a secondary mathematics curriculum design simulation followed by an informal peer critique session

learning_goals: Learners can design secondary mathematics education scenarios in a VR environment.
Learners can provide at least three specific and actionable feedback points on peers’ instructional design works.
Learners can improve their own design proposals at least twice by incorporating feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
